entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Templating workflows broken for paths with special characters on MacOS since SDK 9.0.200 #48794
  • dotnet tool for dotnet framework applications #48791
  • Validating that we need the CI and PR containers #48789

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR].NET 10 Preview 4 Binaries could not work normally on Alpine Linux. #48513

PullRequests

Created

  • Bring back PublishDotnetWatch #48793
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] Do not publish symbol for helloworld binary #48792
  • Enable 'partial' AOT of the CLI #48790
    Area-CLI

Merged

  • Add 9.0.3xx to the branch lockdown labeler #48774
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48788
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48775
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown
  • Implement termination command in the agent and use it to gracefully terminate processes #46003
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, Branch Lockdown
  • tool-update: add --prerelease-skip flag #47174
    untriaged, Area-Tools, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.3xx] Fixes RepositoryUrl attribute generation #48627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression (#47734) #48636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Branch Lockdown
  • [WiX 5] Migrate SDK from v3 to V5 #48699
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Local dev props #48739
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unify the nullable reference type approaches #48776
    Area-CLI
  • Add GitHub Action workflow to update man pages #48784
  • Support RID-specific .NET Tool packages #48575
    untriaged, Area-Tools
